original_text: (But she had taken them up to the roof and hidden them under the stalks of flax she had laid out on the roof.)
korean_text: 그가 이미 그들을 이끌고 지붕에 올라가서 그 지붕에 벌여 놓은 삼대에 숨겼더라

sentences.original_text: But she had taken them up to the roof
and hidden them under the stalks of flax
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 아마 줄기 아래에 숨겼다

sentences.original_text: she had laid out on the roof
